title: Brand Ult Bug on Karthus
body:
I would ult karthus with brand and my ult would not bounce to the minions it would just stop on karthus.
Then i ulted him later and it worked. Tried again it did not work. Then i realized when his defile was on it would stop my ult from bouncing but if it was not on it would bounce.

Hope this can be fixed or was a one game issue.

Thank you

replies.body:
Hey CaptnKillABro -

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
